name: [GD] Carbon Black File Unauthorized Run Alert Rule - Daily Link to Saved Search
description: This rule should fire only once per day. Once you're ready to enable the webhook action for this rule. Include the following saved search link in the ServiceNow case or Email notification: https://827ebd6fd06146bea2d2ad3a453d7e43.vpce.gdw55e.elastic-cloud.com:9243/app/discover#/view/f890e9b0-9a3a-11ec-ab18-0d51419cd75c
query: (aws.fluent_tags: "CARBONBLACK"  and (rule.description: "New unapproved file to computer" or rule.description: "Execution block \(unapproved file\)" or rule.description: "Process demoted")) or (winlog.event_id: "4688" or winlog.event_id: "4663" )

params.message:
The alert condition for '{{context.rule.name}}' was triggered.

Link to results: https://security-prod.kibana.int.gdcorp.tools/app/discover#/view/f890e9b0-9a3a-11ec-ab18-0d51419cd75c
params.subject: Elastic Alert: {{context.rule.name}}
